metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10321 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
web2py before 2.14.6 does not properly check if a host is denied before verifying passwords, allowing a remote attacker to perform brute-force attacks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-gluon - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
python-web2py - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> I think the 'before version' annotation in the CVE description was incorrect.

criterions.comment: web2py package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1').
